amendment.description: To subpoena certain Department of State documents and records.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1285 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 16.
Amendment SA 1285 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S394-395, S395-401; text: CR S394) To subpoena certain Department of State documents and records.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1285 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1285 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 16.
